products.title: Bella Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This grey roller blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blockout the light when desired.
